褒.definition: to praise; to commend; to honor; (of clothes) large or loose

褒姒.definition: Baosi, concubine of King You of Zhou 周幽王[Zhou1 You1 wang2] and one of the famous Chinese beauties

褒忠.definition: Baozhong or Paochung township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

褒忠鄉.definition: Baozhong or Paochung township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

褒禪山.definition: Mt Baochan in Anhui; formerly known as Mt Hua 華山|华山

褒貶.definition: to appraise; to pass judgment on; to speak ill of; praise and censure; appraisal
